name: Unbekannt
description:
Story

Unbekannt is a top down enemy wave based shooter game that was created during the Epic Megajam 2021 for the theme "running out of space".

You are the killer machine well known .EXE and you are seeking revenge for your partner in crime Grim, who was tortured and killed by the human militaries.

The military is tracking you with a satellite system and have you cornered with a laser wall prison in an old abandoned city.  

Can you survive the military battalions while you are running out of space as the laser walls are moving closer?

Gameplay Instructions
Keyboard and mouse for aiming.
WASD for moving the character.
Left mouse button for shooting.
